comment.body:
> [kaffie](#comment_22_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh): Though, I was originally exposed to the idea from this blog, linked from the official zeroblog.

Yeah, that's where I saw it too.
Is this still relevant? Can't remember if NoFish made this easier or not.
ZeroNet Sci-Hub should be possible now that BigFile support is live. Would be interesting if it was made using merger sites. Wish I had the time and skills to do it myself.
